ars_creo.page.starbuncle_wheel: Generates rotational force for Create. Placing a gold block in front of the wheel will increase the RPM.
ars_creo.page.behaviors: Ars Creo enables special contraption behaviors for blocks from Ars Nouveau, including Spell Turrets and Source Jars. Basic Spell Turret - Fires a spell on contraption when interacted. Timer Turret - Fires a spell on its interval. Enchanted Spell Turret - Fires a spell every new block visited. Source Jar - Can be consumed by turrets on a contraption.
